requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Storage: 400 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Must support 640x480 resolution. Certain laptops and onboard video cards may have compatibility issues.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Windows 8 is not yet officially supported, but Yatagarasu Attack on Cataclysm has been tested without problems on Win 8 laptops and desktops.

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: 1.5 GHz Dual-Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or equivalent, 1 GB Dedicated VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Anything
  • Additional Notes: Lower specs on GPU may result in lag @ 60 FPS with in-game resolutions beyond 2x windowed. Low quality 30 FPS option is included in-game which may alleviate lag. Lag may occur when livestreaming the game at 60FPS at resolutions beyond 2x windowed, even on powerful computers (if you have streaming issues we recommend 30FPS in-game and with your recording software). Please note that very rarely, the sound in-game may drop out for a few seconds.

  • OS: Steam compatible 64-bit Linux distribution
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB, OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8 Mountain Lion
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB, OpenGL 2.0
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB, DirectX 9.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse or touch control
